description:
The imperial palace is attacked by Saito Tatsuoki, who had been reborn, and Mitsuhide has Chidori go seek the aid of Hosokawa Fujitaka. Meanwhile, Mitsuhide tries to hold down the fort. Will the reinforcements get there in time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hangeki wa Uta to Tomo ni
La contre-attaque se fait en poésie
Let the Counterattack Begin with a Poem
